title: The trough of the business cycle

content.question: When an economy is at the trough of the business cycle, which of the following is then true about the state of the economy?

choices.label: The economy is producing at its potential output level.
The economy is producing above its potential output level.
The unemployment rate is lower than the natural rate of unemployment.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
